mapper.select: SELECT A.TOPOCKETCODE, A.AUTODIVAMOUNT, B.POCKETNAME FROM T_AUTO_DIVIDE_SETTING A, T_MYONE_POCKET B WHERE A.ACCOUNTNO = B.ACCOUNTNO AND A.ACCOUNTNO=#{accountNo} AND A.TOPOCKETCODE=B.POCKETCODE

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'MM') AS MONTH, SUM(CONAMOUNT) AS AMOUNT FROM t_consume_history WHERE ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=3 AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),-6) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -1)) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'MM') ORDER BY MONTH ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'MM') AS MONTH, SUM(CONAMOUNT) AS AMOUNT FROM t_consume_history WHERE ID=#{id} AND POCKETCODE=2 AND TO_DATE(CONDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),-6) AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -1)) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CONDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'MM') ORDER BY MONTH ASC
